name: askSocial.me
overview:
askSocial.me lets you discover common interest within your own social networks and helps you communicate with them.

It is a proven fact that we all make friends with others who share some common interest. But do you always remember them when you have a question or need advice about the interest you share? Most likely not. Its just so tough to remember who shares what interest with you.

Our goal with askSocial.me is to help you remember and communicate with your friends who share common interest. Search based on your own interest and we will search your friends and remind you who shares that interest. You can then reach out and communicate directly with that friend. Whether its to ask a question, suggest an idea, share an event or just discuss the interest.

Sign up for an account, select your social networks, search for your interest and let us do our magic to help you find your common interest and communicate with friends. That SIMPLE!
